comments.body: Technically only [`h5py >=2.1`]( https://github.com/frejanordsiek/hdf5storage/blob/0.1.14/setup.py#L22 ) is required, but `h5py >=2.3` provides [full functionality]( https://github.com/frejanordsiek/hdf5storage/tree/0.1.14#dependencies ). Given that `h5py` 2.3 is already 3yrs old (2.1 is 5yrs old) and `conda-forge` started with 2.6, this not only is totally reasonable, but maybe even unnecessary to specify. Though we put here anyways as a note.

This is an [optional requirement]( https://github.com/frejanordsiek/hdf5storage/tree/0.1.14#dependencies ), but SciPy is necessary to support the [new and old MATLAB file formats]( https://github.com/frejanordsiek/hdf5storage/tree/0.1.14#matlab-mat-v73-file-support ) (SciPy supports the old one), which is still quite common.
